description: Talk to Drezel to start the quest.

2.step: Attempt to enter the grotto talk to Fillman with a Ghostspeak Amulet equipped. (Chat: 2-4)

description: Attempt to enter the grotto.
Talk to Fillman with a Ghostspeak Amulet equipped.

3.step: Pick-up the mirror underneath the washing bowl.

description: Pick-up the washing bowl to find a mirror.
Pick-up the mirror.
Use the mirror on Filliman.

5.step: Right-click and search the grotto tree to get his journal.

description: Right-click and search the grotto tree to get his journal.

6.step: Use the journal on him for the Druidic spell. (Chat: 4)

description: Use the journal on him for the Druidic spell. (Chat: 4)
Talk to Drezel.

8.step: Cast the Druidic spell next to a rotting log.

description: Stand next to a rotting log and cast the Druidic spell.

9.step: Pick a mushroom growing from the log.

description: Pick a mushroom growing from the log.

10.step: Use the mushroom on the light-brown stone.

description: Use the mushroom on the light-brown stone.

11.step: Use spell card on the grey stone.

description: Use spell card on the grey stone.

12.step: Stand on the orange stone and talk to Filliman. (Chat: 3)

description: Stand on the orange stone and tell Filliman you've solved the puzzle.

13.step: Enter the hole under the tree.

description: Enter the hole under the tree.
Search the grotto.

15.step: Talk to the Nature Spirit twice.

description: Talk to the Nature Spirit twice.

16.subtitle: Killing the Ghasts
16.step: Use the Silver sickle (b)'s Bloom ability to harvest mushrooms and fill the Druid pouch.

description: Equip and right-click and select bloom on the Silver sickle (b)'s next to a mushroom to harvest mushrooms and then fill the Druid pouch with it.

17.step: Use the filled druid pouch on Ghasts to make them attack-able, kill three of them.

description: Use the filled druid pouch on Ghasts to make them attack-able, defeat three of them.
Do this three times and defeat all three.
Talk to the Nature Spirit.
